Class AbsoluteMonthlyRecurrencePattern

RecurrencePattern, TaskRecurrencePattern
public class AbsoluteMonthlyRecurrencePattern
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecurrencePattern, TaskRecurrencePattern

Represents a monthly recurrence pattern.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Converts the value of the current AbsoluteMonthlyRecurrencePattern object to its equivalent string representation.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:

getInterval

public int getInterval()
Gets the interval between two consecutive recurring items. For example, if the Interval element has a value of 5, the recurring item occurs every 5 months. The range of valid values is from 1 to 99.

Returns:

setInterval

public void setInterval(int interval)
Sets the interval between two consecutive recurring items. For example, if the Interval element has a value of 5, the recurring item occurs every 5 months. The range of valid values is from 1 to 99.

Parameters:
interval -

getDayOfMonth

public int getDayOfMonth()
Gets the day in a month that a recurring item occurs. The range of values for this property is 1 to 31. If for a particular month this value is larger than the number of days in the month, the last day of the month is assumed for this property.

Returns:

setDayOfMonth

public void setDayOfMonth(int dayOfMonth)
Sets the day in a month that a recurring item occurs. The range of values for this property is 1 to 31. If for a particular month this value is larger than the number of days in the month, the last day of the month is assumed for this property.

Parameters:
dayOfMonth -
